entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Support error codes for HttpRequestException #76644
  • MemoryCache Compact/Removal Efficiency #76643
  • Perfomance of For Loops is worse in Net7 to Net6 #76638
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests.Vectors.Vector64Tests.Vector64UInt64ShiftLeftTest #76637
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: XDocumentTests.Streaming.XStreamingElementAPI.NestedXStreamingElementPlusIEnumerable #76636
    8.0.0
  • TrimMode=partial seems broken with PublishReadyToRun=true on .NET 7 RC1 #76635
  • SynthesizeRecognizeTests.SpeechSynthesizerToSpeechRecognitionEngine - NullReferenceException #76626
  • System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.EncryptDecrypt_Span.RsaDecryptPkcs1LeadingZero test is failing on Windows.10.Amd64.ServerRS5 #76611
  • [wasm] dotnet run doesn't work for relative path #76609
    7.0.0
  • Allow multiple constructors in System.Text.Json #76608
  • Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility 6.0.0 cause CVE-2022-34716 issue #76604
  • Cannot load symbols for release project when "Publish Single File" is set to true - it want's to load "singlefilehost.pdb". #76601
  • [Question] Architecture-independent libraries build #76598
  • [mono][jit] Codegen emits unnecessary stores and loads with FP function args #76597
  • A DateTime.ToString with CultureInfo("nb-NO") gives the wrong datetime string output on iOS #76596
    8.0.0
  • Vector64/128/256/512<T> and Vector<T> Consistency/Enhancements #76593
  • MARSHALLED_UNICODE_STRING[] array marshalling leaks memory #76584
    7.0.x
  • SString::AppendUTF8 converts 'this' to UTF16 if it is non-ascii #76581
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Dotnet runtime aarch=arm64 fails execute asp.net core MVC wrong ELF class: ELFCLASS32 #3106
    Future
  • Consider removing ".dll" from the "const string HostPolicy = "hostpolicy.dll" #60080
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Tests.BlazorWasmBuildPublishTests.WithDllImportInMainAssembly failing #76617
  • [API Proposal]: Use Predicate<T> instead of Func<T, bool> #76627
  • Tests fail in x86 after the latest update with "Internal CLR error. (0x80131506)" #76219
    8.0.0
  • Support Linux/arm, Linux/arm64 in JIT rolling build #69807
    Future
  • Assertion failed '((-slop) <= diff) && (diff <= slop)' in '<>c__DisplayClass40_0:<InvalidInput_Null>b__0():System.Object:this' during 'Compute edge weights (2, false)' #74169
    8.0.0
  • SuperPMI diffs output: split throughput diff by type #73505
    8.0.0
  • Dispose on singleton services is not called automatically by DI Container #76568
  • Test failure: JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_40607\\Runtime_40607\\Runtime_40607.cmd #76546
    8.0.0
  • Quic Support Check Throws Exception Breaking ASP.NET core #76420
    8.0.0
  • GetAssemblyName() test scenario should skip for singlefile and aot form factors #68980
    8.0.0
  • HttpStress is broken on Windows (CAP_SYS_PTRACE) #76045
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7.0.100-preview.7.22377.5 threw an exception in docker (with memory limit but unbounded cpu) #76199
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: synchronous API for creating a Quic listener #76360
    8.0.0
  • RawDefaultValue is resolved differently between runtimes #76174
    8.0.0
  • Json.Text - Unable to deserialize ObservableCollection with Preserve option #76602
  • Assert failure(PID 6732 [0x00001a4c], Thread: 7104 [0x1bc0]): Consistency check failed: Crst Level violation: Can't take level 9 lock CrstCodeVersioning because you already holding level 5 lock CrstCOMWrapperCache #76512
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!op1->isUsedFromMemory()' #76511
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't scan bricks of frozen segments in verify_heap #76645
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add XxHash3 to System.IO.Hashing #76641
    area-System.IO
  • [mono] Restore correct llvm 14 version for macOS too #76640
    area-Build-mono
  • Use normal VNs when adding NRE exception sets #76639
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • cherry-picking small refactor fix from 7.0 #76634
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add workaround for Windows 10 (1903) bug to RSABCrypt #76633
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] benchmark simple app without JSExport #76632
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Remove unused EmitBlobWithRelocs method #76631
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Migrate docker containers to latest tags #76630
  • Ensure we cleanup the marshalling for elements of collections (stateful and stateless) #76629
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Include bitcasts in an assert #76628
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [hot_reload] Fix unresolved token when new nested structs are used #76625
    Servicing-consider, area-EnC-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Rename request count to permit count on System.Threading.RateLimiting #76623
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm]Testing https://github.com/dotnet/performance/pull/2629 #76622
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, perf-pipeline
  • Update branding to 6.0.11 #76620
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Avoid __vsnprintf_s for printing method names #76619
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [hot_reload] Fix unresolved token when new nested structs are used #76618
    area-EnC-mono
  • Support Arm64 "constructed" constants in SuperPMI asm diffs #76616
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update docs on libraries cross build #76614
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Streamline SIMD recognition #76613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add explicit flushing to ProcessStartInfoTests #76610
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Rewrite the shared JsonSerializerOptions cache implementation. #76607
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add RIDs for Tizen 7.0 #76600
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add RIDs for Tizen6.5 and 7.0 #76599
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Optimize out some ldloca uses #76595
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Updating Vector128 to have its software fallback be 2x Vector64<T> ops #76592
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [ilasm] Lazily allocate memory in Indx256 #76590
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] fix lower heap hard limit condition for regions #76588
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix FOH for SOS #76586
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fix Interop.Gdi32.StartDoc p/invoke #76582
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Drawing, 7.0.0

Merged

  • [NativeAot] Start running S.R.Metadata tests #76583
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove .dll from Interop.Libraries.HostPolicy for consistency with other runtime libraries #76466
    area-Host
  • [release/7.0] CI: Run `runtime-extra-platforms` with batched builds for release #76615
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Ensure NI_Vector128_AsVector128 (aka `Vector128<T> AsVector128(this Vector<T> value)`) doesn't have a side-effect in its assert #76547
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [mono][sgen] Update memory load information after world is resumed #76534
    Servicing-approved, area-GC-mono, 7.0.0
  • [release/7.0] backport Tar fixes #76322
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Fix vnDumpZeroObj #76612
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WBT.WithDllImportInAssembly - don't use RandomFileName in `id` #76621
    test-failure, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • GC: Fix CheckPromoted for frozen objects #76251
    area-GC-coreclr
  • fix lower heap hard limit condition for regions #76407
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Do not produce full-width local field stores for normalize-on-store locals #76549
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove macOS exception for building crossgen2 with NativeAOT #76561
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix Interop.Gdi32.StartDoc p/invoke #76569
    area-System.Drawing
  • Use more accurate condition to suppress GetAssemblyName test #76591
    area-System.Reflection
  • HttpStress do not use SYS_PTRACE cap for docker runs #76307
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Update to latest .NET 7 Roslyn compiler #76471
    Servicing-approved, area-Meta, 7.0.0
  • CI: Fix triggers for pipeline changes #76594
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI: Run `runtime-extra-platforms` with batched builds for release #76587
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure
  • Simplify marshalling of WEB_SOCKET_HTTP_HEADER #76589
    area-System.Net
  • Update provider_compute_event_enable_mask so EventSouces with no keywords show up by default #75248
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • WasmAppHost: block port# 5060 and 5061, for the webserver #76485
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [LinuxBionic] Disable failing ProcessStartInfo tests on CI #76585
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 8.0.0
  • [PERF][MAUI] Update net6.0 Maui nuget.config link #76576
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • AOT Runtime.Base: Change AttributeTargets and AttributeUsageAttribute to public #76573
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Avoid unnecessarily zipping tests #76580
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update Crst lock levels #76553
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • System.Private.Xml AOT compatibility fixes #76473
    area-System.Xml, linkable-framework
  • Fixing where `ClearContained` is called for certain Arm64 cast ops #76517
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [JIT] Cleanup to lsra inspired by #73424 #76481
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Only R2R public methods, methods that override public methods, and internal methods that aren't always inlined #75793
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Remove all uses of `SString::Printf()` accepting `WCHAR` #76571
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Retire .NET 5 #69911
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • remove LangVersion workarounds #76394
    community-contribution
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • low memory fixes #76468
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Streamline root commands and cli helpers #76537
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use AzDO Pipeline Resources to define our build Docker containers #75473
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add `JsonEncodedText.Value` #76545
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Use new buildpools #76208
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add portable linux source build leg #75546
  • [mono][debugger] Debugger method invokes dont' handle ref fields in ref structs #76332
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [hot_reload] Add instance fields #76462
    area-EnC-mono
  • Add readmes to reflection #76567
    documentation, area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Simplify handling of multi-reg returns #74499
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] Force AOT+interpreter for iOSSimulator arm64 library test local build #76551
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Improvements to CoreCLR Building, Debugging, and Testing Documentation #75569
    documentation, area-Meta
  • [Mono] Improve the performance of EqualsAll for Arm64 with LLVM as backend #74574
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove closed issues from issues.targets #75363
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Bring back readability lost in .Net 6, and stop emitting BOM. #75637
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • Make sure the initial mark list size is capped #76083
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Allow for null XmlSerializers when loading pre-gen from mappings. #75638
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #75643
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Fix binary serialization of DateTime with DCS and add test. #75650
    Servicing-approved, area-Serialization, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0][mono] Fix iOS/tvOS build with Xcode 14 #76448
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Fix numeric IntPtr behavioral changes analyzer findings #75557
    area-Meta
  • Rename request count to permit count on System.Threading.RateLimiting #76558
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE] [Experiment] Try to return MSBuild Server back. #76536
  • Clean up JIT<->EE "get class name" methods, support nested classes in method sets #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Delete dangling thread session states #76431
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Added snake and kebab naming policies to JSON serializer #69613
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] EmccExportedRuntimeMethod MSBuild item #76455
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [mono] Unify invoke code with coreclr #72717
    area-System.Reflection, 8.0.0
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add debugger display for huge BigInteger #75796
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][Android] Backport fix NetworkInterface.GetAllNetworkInterfaces #76565
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, os-android, 7.0.0
  • source-build: support building runtime using non-portable runtime packages. #75597
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add Darc dependency entries for our dependencies on Roslyn #75617
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Enable smoke tests on macOS #76560
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Implement next part of PackedSimd class #76539
    new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Reduce some allocations when emitting CFI code #76562
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix thread-safety of JsonDocument.GetString/TextEquals #76450
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Hardware intrinsics tests in new style #74886
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-04
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Make FCall transition go through lambda that can be translated into a functionpointer + pointer arg parameter #2019

Updated

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: support FIELD_LIST and lowering promoted fields #2007

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet exec current folder issue #28315
  • crossgen2 doesn't resolve compilers for non-portable rids #28312
  • dotnet-cli segfault on Gentoo #28311

Closed

  • Get back old templates (console, mvc, etc) into dotnet new #23029
  • `dotnet new search` should differentiate templates that are included with the SDK #27763

PullRequests

Created

  • [dotnet tool] Add ability to check if a tool is installed #28333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable codeql #28330
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix checking for updated workload packs in advertising manifests #28327
    Area-Workloads
  • Update branding to 6.0.403 #28324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.306 #28323
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.111 #28322
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Update branding to 3.1.425 #28321
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add more test cases for producing reference assemblies #27751
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix msbuild evaluation of ApiCompat task pkg #28301
    Servicing-approved, Area-ApiCompat

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2011726 #27667
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28303
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add warning when targeting 7.0 in 17.3 and remove 7.0 from the list of supported targets #28224
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet-new] Add inRoot option for AddProjectsToSolutionPostAction #28295
    Area-dotnet new
  • Improve the example with specified language when language option is given with invalid option #28135
    Area-dotnet new

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Anonymous Interface Objects #4301
  • File-local types #6011
    11.0
  • [Proposal]: Roles and extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Spec out as return only #6483

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LSIF fails to generate for some projects with "Could not load file or assembly `Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp, Version=4.0.0.0".... #64491
  • Suggested UX for Inline Diagnostics #64474
  • Assertion hit when removing RuntimeSupportsByRefFields setter #64471
  • CSharpCommandLineParser does not set CompilationOptions.StrongNameProvider when "/keyfile:..." is used #64468
  • Using `KeyValuePair<,>` can result in null reference runtime errors which are not caught by the compiler #64467
  • Allow "Convert cast" refactorings to work with nullable value types #64466
  • Autocompletion suggests `struct` after `sealed record` #64465
  • IDE1006 should trigger build failed #64464
  • StringSyntaxAttribute for params arguments only highlight the first argument #64463
  • Roslyn could not load assembly when CreateFromStream method is used. #64462

Closed

  • auto completion issue #45782
    Backlog
  • Required member nullable warnings are not restored when missing `: base()` on a `[SetsRequiredMember]` constructor #63768
    17.4
  • Update docs.microsoft.com links to learn.microsoft.com #64268
    17.5
  • Reduce typing delay caused by import completion #52814
    17.3

PullRequests

Created

  • Add TargetFramework.Net70 #64490
    Area-Compilers
  • Semantic snippets - constructor snippet #64489
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Revert "Implement IAttributeOperation (#59369)"" #64488
    Area-Compilers
  • Track EA APIs #64487
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move to a simpler model of writing assets out to OOP #64486
    Area-IDE
  • Add analyzer info for detecting IntPtr/UintPtr behavioral changes #64485
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix Union to match the semantics of GetApplicableAnalyzers #64484
    Area-IDE
  • Caller of an async local function cannot expect any of the callee’s code to execute #64482
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove dependency on ms.extensions.dependencyinjection from roslyn lsp #64481
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Experimental api support for HostOutputs #64478
    Area-Compilers
  • Add additional information to help F# with navigating to symbols #64475
    Area-IDE
  • Move to new image #64472
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Catch deconstruction ref escape errors in invocation escape analysis #64470
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Semantic snippets - change filter to keep old snippets in if replacement does not exist #64459
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Do not inline fault-helper #64480
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add "target type match" filter support to enum and static members providers #64477
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move to simplified helper extension for reading data from a stream #64476
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add back accidentally deleted activity id correlation #64479
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64483
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64473
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add tests to verify bug is fixed #64408
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members, Next
  • Fix LSIF handling of extension methods #64460
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Update help link URI for code style diagnostics #64438
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Improve CLaSP doc comments #64446
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64469
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64461
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix out of bounds error when doing speculative operations #64454
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64456
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64458
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64493
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64492
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Set val escape on expression variables #64414
    Area-Compilers
  • Load CompletionProvider from references in background #64352
    Area-IDE
  • Add instrumentation to investigate flakiness in `ConstantFolding_01` #64404
    Test, Flaky
  • Support `scoped` keyword in declaration expressions. #64380
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Merge the new UnitTesting solution crawler into Main #64368
    Area-IDE
  • Add a new Location.Create overload for external file location with a different mappedLineSpan #64240
    Area-Analyzers
  • Fixed nullable warning for "change cast type" refactoring #64080
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Respond to cancellation when a generator is running, so we can still report time. #57122
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.5
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers, 17.5
  • Add support for code refactorings and code fixes in non-source files #64364
    Area-Analyzers
  • Colorize langword inside doc comments #63900
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Do not report a secondary NFW exception after already reporting one earlier. #64412
    Area-IDE
  • Allow TS to derive from the more performant internal API #64258
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WebAssembly navigation behaves differently after publish #44368
  • .NET 7 RC1 "dotnet new grpc" creates a project that references a package which is not compatible with .NET 7 #44367
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #44366
  • Blazor: NavigationManager RegisterLocationChangingHandler and LocationChanged never are invoked #44365
  • `services.AddDefaultIdentity(configureIdentityOptions, configureAuthenticationOptions)` #44364
  • [Blazor] Virtualization does not work with web components #44357
    Backlog
  • AuthenticationSchemeOptions delegates don't have an async compatible alternative #44355

Closed

  • [Blazor WASM] Synchronous events #28250
    Backlog
  • Need to add documentation for `DynamicRouteValueTransformer` #23599
    Backlog
  • Allow showing invalid input values on data bound properties #15195
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] Consider using tracing APIs to perform more fine grained logging #14034
    Backlog
  • HashRoute Support Request #18123
    Backlog
  • razorclasslib template project support for F# #18067
    Backlog
  • Enable ASP.NET Core on Apple Silicon #26821
    Backlog
  • Using SSR (Angular) in .NET 6 #39295
    Discussions
  • Blazor - Title attribute in SVG is picked up by HeadOutlet #44231
    7.0.0
  • F# tests might not verify compilability #7638
    Backlog
  • F# MVC Does not even support authentication out of the box. #11905
    Backlog
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With VS 17.4 preview 3 + NET7 RC2 installed on Local OS, the template "ASP.NET Core with React.js and Redux" is inconsistent with EN's template in dotnet new --list. #44104
  • View in Area missing imports from Views/Shared/_ViewImports.cshtml #44356
  • Empty Blazor WebAssembly template should have a <title> in index.html #44335
    7.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Verify no two or more pages are using the same @page path #44266
  • does Blazor support Multi Page Applications (MPA)? #44338
  • Blazor @page directive remove requirement for string double quotes (RZ1016) #44352
  • HTTP/3: Enable in Kestrel by default #36486
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve documentation of ConnectionInfo.RemoteIpAddress #44370
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #44369
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Switch to consolidated Windows build images and Svc pool #44348
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Switch to consolidated Windows build images #44347
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Switch to consolidated Windows build images and Svc pool #44349
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [6.0] Allow zero byte reads on the test server response body #44020
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.11

    Backlog

    Backlog

  • AdaptiveTriggers not working #8492

PullRequests

Updated

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add a custom collection interface with an `IsLoaded` property. #29256

Closed

  • Json: error when trying to materialize json entity with nullable property that is missing in the json string - should materialize the property as null instead #29219
    7.0.0
  • Json: projecting nullable scalar produces debug.assert in SqlExpression ctor #29225
    7.0.0
  • Json: nullable enums on entities mapped to json don't use enum-to-int converter, rather than string, like for non-nullable enums #29217
    7.0.0
  • EF7 Json column: constructor with optional enum-parameter throws ArgumentException #29214
    7.0.0
  • How to map in EF Core 6 a vlue object with derive classes? #29252
  • Is there a way to use interfaces with EF Core? #29245
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.DbUpdateConcurrencyException #29166
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite 7 crash on iOS #28773
  • How to use EF Core in applications targeting .NET Framework 4.8 after EF Core 3.1 end of support? #29136
  • How to re-arrange columns order of mysql database after updated database? #29248

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #29258
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #29257
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Fix for some minor bugs around JSON mappings #29227
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Clear reference to DbDataReader from RelationalDataReader #29005
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.11
  • [release/3.1] Move to Ubuntu 22.04 #29157
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.31
  • [release/6.0] Move to Ubuntu 22.04 #29158
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Avoid re-sending PRAGMA key on pooled connections #29215
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.11
  • Update branding to 6.0.11 #29255
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update branding to 3.1.31 #29254
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Remove 'latest' from the docker tag #29253

Updated

  • Query: Allow final GroupBy navigation #29205
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
